snippet: A former teacher is suing the Cincinnati school district, saying she was discriminated against because of her rare phobia: a fear of young children.
abstract: Former teacher Maria Waltherr-Willard sues the Cincinnati school district, claiming discrimination against her phobia of young children.
lead_paragraph: A former teacher is suing the Cincinnati school district, saying she was discriminated against because of her rare phobia: a fear of young children.

headline.main: Ohio: Child-Phobic Teacher Sues School District
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Child-Phobic Teacher Sues School District
